extensionDescription.message: Sends information of the current tab to predefined webhooks.

popupNoWebhooksConfigured.message: No webhooks configured. Please open the settings.
popupNoWebhooksConfigured.description: Message shown when no webhooks are set up.

popupSettingsLink.description: Link text to open the options page.

popupSending.description: Button text while the request is in progress.

popupBtnTextSent.description: Button text after a successful request.

popupBtnTextFailed.description: Button text after a failed request.

popupErrorNoActiveTab.description: Error when the active tab cannot be determined.

popupNoGroup.description: Label for webhooks without a group in the popup.

optionsPageHeader.description: Main heading on the options page.

optionsPageDescription.message: Here you can manage your webhooks. Each webhook gets a label for the button and a target URL.
optionsPageDescription.description: Introductory text on the options page.

optionsLabelInputLabel.description: Label for the webhook label input field.

optionsEmojiLabel.description: Label for the webhook emoji input field.

optionsEmojiPlaceholder.description: Placeholder for the webhook emoji input.

optionsEmojiChooseButton.description: Button text to open the emoji picker.

optionsEmojiClearButton.description: Button text to clear the emoji.

optionsEmojiSearchPlaceholder.description: Placeholder for the emoji search input.

optionsLabelInputPlaceholder.description: Placeholder for the webhook label input.

optionsUrlInputLabel.description: Label for the webhook URL input field.

optionsStoredWebhooksHeader.description: Sub-heading for the list of saved webhooks.

optionsNoWebhooksMessage.description: Message when the list of webhooks is empty.

optionsCancelEditButton.description: Text for the cancel button in edit mode.

optionsAddNewWebhookButton.description: Button text to open the add webhook form.

optionsHTTPMethodLabel.description: Label for selecting the HTTP method.

optionsAdditionalHeadersLabel.description: Label for the additional headers section.

optionsHeaderNamePlaceholder.description: Placeholder text for header name input.

optionsHeaderValuePlaceholder.description: Placeholder text for header value input.

optionsAddHeaderButton.description: Button text to add a header.

optionsRemoveHeaderButton.description: Button text to remove a header.

optionsIdentifierLabel.description: Label for the identifier input field.

optionsIdentifierPlaceholder.description: Placeholder for the identifier input field.

optionsURLFilterLabel.description: Label for the URL filter input field.

optionsURLFilterPlaceholder.message: Show button when URL contains this text
optionsURLFilterPlaceholder.description: Placeholder for the URL filter input field.

optionsCustomPayloadLabel.description: Label for the custom payload section.

optionsCustomPayloadPlaceholder.description: Placeholder for the custom payload textarea.

optionsAvailableVariablesText.description: Intro text for the variables help section.

optionsExportButton.description: Button text to export all webhooks.

optionsImportButton.description: Button text to import webhooks from a file.

optionsGroupLabel.description: Label for the webhook group selection.

optionsNoGroup.description: Option for webhooks without a group.

optionsManageGroupsButton.description: Button to open the group management modal.

optionsManageGroupsHeader.description: Header for the group management modal.

optionsNewGroupNameLabel.description: Label for the new group name input.

optionsNewGroupNamePlaceholder.description: Placeholder for the new group name input.

optionsAddGroupButton.description: Button to add a new group.

optionsExistingGroupsHeader.description: Header for the existing groups list.

optionsEditGroupButton.description: Button to edit a group name.

optionsSaveGroupButton.description: Button to save a group name.

optionsCloseManageGroupsButton.description: Button to close the group management modal.

optionsImportInfo.description: Information text shown next to the import button.

optionsTestSuccess.description: Success message for the test webhook.

optionsTestError.description: Error message for the test webhook.

optionsManageAppearanceButton.description: Button to open the appearance modal.

optionsCloseAppearanceButton.description: Button to close the appearance modal.
